tests.name: SWML Generation
tests.run: swaig-test solution/agent.py --dump-swml --raw | python -c "import sys,json; d=json.load(sys.stdin); exit(0 if 'sections' in d and 'main' in d['sections'] else 1)"

tests.name: Prompt Configuration
tests.run: swaig-test solution/agent.py --dump-swml --raw | python -c "import sys,json; d=json.load(sys.stdin); exit(0 if 'prompt' in str(d) else 1)"

tests.name: Language Configuration
tests.run: swaig-test solution/agent.py --dump-swml --raw | python -c "import sys,json; d=json.load(sys.stdin); exit(0 if 'languages' in str(d) else 1)"
